listener
Class Listener

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      listener.Listener
Direct Known Subclasses:
ListenerImpl
public abstract class Listener
extends java.util.Observable

Abstract class for a filesystem listener, watching for changes.

Author:
Or Shwartz, Itay Evron
See Also:
Observable

public abstract boolean isActive()
Returns:
True if the listener is active. False is returned otherwise.

close

public abstract void close()
Performs listener finalization actions. Should be called when the listener is no longer needed.
